title: Executive Order 6035-Authorizing the Appointment of Mr. Kenneth C. Macpherson
content: Kenneth C. Macpherson, who, since July 11, 1922, has been employed in the Department of Commerce and the Post Office Department in positions excepted from civil-service requirements, may be appointed in the classified service without compliance with civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Postmaster General.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6035-Authorizing the Appointment of Mr. Kenneth C. Macpherson Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361585
